channel.title: Comments on: Nutella and Berry Dessert Pizza

item.title: By: Aria
item.dc:creator: Aria
item.description: This Pizza looks and sounds so delicious! Thanks for sharing such a wonderful recipe.
item.content:encoded: This Pizza looks and sounds so delicious! Thanks for sharing such a wonderful recipe.

item.title: By: Marcellina
item.dc:creator: Marcellina
item.description: We have a woodfired oven so we regularly have pizza parties. Every time we have Nutella pizza but we have never used Tim Tams as well. What genius idea! I will definitely be using your recipe this Friday for our next pizza party!
item.content:encoded: We have a woodfired oven so we regularly have pizza parties. Every time we have Nutella pizza but we have never used Tim Tams as well. What genius idea! I will definitely be using your recipe this Friday for our next pizza party!
